title: Cancel Microsoft 365 and save hundreds with this lifetime version
content:
Macworld

You’re probably paying Microsoft 365 way more than you need to… and for what? The same apps, just on an endless subscription loop? With a Microsoft Office lifetime license, you can break free from the monthly payments and get the classic Office suite for a one-time fee. Right now, you can pay just $69.97 and it’s yours forever (reg. $219.99).

This lifetime license works on one Mac and includes all the essential apps: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, and OneNote. You’ll get full access to the features you use most without needing to worry about monthly renewals, surprise price hikes, or internet access just to open a spreadsheet.

Immediately after completing your purchase, you’ll receive an email with a download link and your unique software license key to get the apps set up on your Mac. Once they’re installed, you’ll never be asked to pay again to access the apps until you upgrade your device.

Skip the subscription fatigue. Download Microsoft Office for Mac while it’s on sale for $69.97 (reg. $219.99). No coupons needed to get this deal.
